Html: Have you guys used any .NET Barcode library to generate barcode in your .NET program? How's it? I need to generate barcode in my .NET program.
One of my friends told me .NET Barcode library from Onbarcode is good. But I  know nothing about Onbarcode. I have heard this name for the first time. Where can I see their products and buy it.

This is open source project. Free of charge, just check license. We do it use our free time with different reasons. 

You can give it a try and see whether you like it or not. 

Documentation is here:

QrCode Info

http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=QrCode&referringTitle=Documentation

Renderer for generate different images:

http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Renderer&referringTitle=Documentation

Controller to use on .Net applications:

http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=User%20Controls&referringTitle=Documentation

 

But this project is only for QrCode, if you need others, I would suggest ZXing. They have .Net library.

https://code.google.com/p/zxing/
